channel.title: Event-Modeling on Sanjay's Blog

item.title: event modeling
item.description: event modelling What is event modeling? Event modeling is a simple technique used to design a system. It generally takes relatively little time to learn and get started. In event modeling, we use sticky notes to write things down. Sticky note colors and their purposes: Orange sticky notes: Represent events. We write down the event occurrence in the past tense. Events are generally triggered by the UI or by some external API.
